glsa.title: MIT Kerberos 5: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MIT Kerberos 5, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to cause Denial of Service.

background.p: MIT Kerberos 5 is a suite of applications that implement the Kerberos network protocol.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in MIT Kerberos 5. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All MIT Kerberos 5 users should upgrade to the latest version:
